scripts.serve: env $(cat .env | xargs) budo example/index.js:bundle.js --pushstate --dir=public --live -- -t babelify -g aliasify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -dv
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin example/index.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g aliasify -g unassertify | uglifyjs -mc > public/bundle.js
scripts.test-browser: browserify -t babelify test-browser/index.js | htmlify test-browser/index.html | tape-run --input html | tap-spec
